messages.text: Hello Sarah, thank you for submitting your life insurance application. To proceed with your application, we'll need some additional documents: medical examination report and proof of income. Please upload these at your earliest convenience.
Hi John, I've just uploaded my medical examination report. I'll get the proof of income document to you by tomorrow. Thanks for your help with this process!
Perfect! I've received all your documents. Your application is now under underwriting review. I'll keep you updated on the progress. Expected turnaround is 5-7 business days.
Hi Michael, I've received your health insurance application. Everything looks good so far. I'll be in touch once we hear back from the underwriting team.
Great news Michael! Your health insurance application has been approved. Your policy documents have been sent to your email address. Welcome to Metro Shield Health!
Hi John, I was wondering about travel insurance options for my upcoming business trip to Europe. Could you provide some information about coverage options?
